attributes.action: Stop Thanet District Council installing THEIR enquiries desk in OUR new library.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thanet District Council intend to repeat the undoubted disaster that was once Margate library by installing their council facilities in the newly rebuilt Ramsgate library. We strongly believe that libraries are a place for people of all agaes to enjoy books in a comfortable, pleasant and relaxed environment. We do not wish to share that space with people queuing to pay their council taxes or complaining about rubbish collections.
